702135f-a.title: Bronx: Westchester Avenue - Tremont Avenue (East)
702135f-a.text:
Westchester Square (Eaat Tremont Ave.), east side, north from but
not including Fink to Roberts Aves.
July 9, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
702135f-a.folder: Westchester Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

702134f-a.title: Bronx: Westchester Avenue - Tremont Avenue (East)
702134f-a.text:
Westchester Square, on the north side of Westchester Avenue, at E. Tremont Avenue, showing the Wstchester Square branch of the New York Publio Library. The wing is a comfort station.
August 15, 1940
Views 1,2
P. L. Sperr
702134f-a.folder: Westchester Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

702129f-a.title: Bronx: Westchester Avenue - Tremont Avenue (East)
702129f-a.text:
Westchester Avenue, south side, east of E. Tremont Avenue,
hnear Westchester Creek.
August 1, 1940
P. L. Sperr
702129f-a.folder: Westchester Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

702140f-b.title: Bronx: Westchester Square - Westchester Avenue
702140f-b.text:
(1)
94 and 96 Westchester Scuare (East Tremont Ave.), at, and adjoining its eastern intersection with Westchester Ave. The G. W. Bromley map of 1927 shows these houses to be actually on East Tremont
Ave., but bearing the above indicated addresses.
July 9, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date, showing a more extensive view east on Tremont Ave. On the left appears a portion of the elevated structure
of the I.R.T. Pelham Bay Park subway line.
August 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
702140f-b.folder: Westchester Square & Westchester Avenue, Bronx, NY
